systems.name: Main Screen System
systems.description: The main screen system of Tank War that allows players to interact with various game functions.
systems.mechanics: Players interact with UI components to access different game features such as profile, matchmaking, tank customization, etc.
systems.objectives: Ensure clear communication of available functions without overwhelming the player with information.
